metadata.name: Sunrise March No.2
metadata.description:
2022 

 Agnieszka Pilat in collaboration with Spot 

 IRL painting: 48 x 48 inches, Acrylic on Belgium Linen, Quadruple Robot 

 Sunrise March No.2 is executed by Pilat and the quadruped robot's marching feet, as a lyrical metaphor for the feet of millions of refugees marching towards the West in hope of escaping the war.

 The video showcasing the making of this artwork can be found at https://ipfs.io/ipfs/bafybeiaoypdwmrrsahelibhysehajr4pjvgkmv67hucru6uvvnqnfi2kou
